election.tally
Class Candidate

java.lang.Object
  election.tally.CandidateStatus
      election.tally.Candidate

public class Candidate
extends CandidateStatus

The Candidate object records the number of votes received during each round of counting. Votes can only be added to the candidate's stack while the candidate has a status of CONTINUING.

Author:
Dermot Cochran
See Also:
Department of Environment and Local Government, Count Requirements and Commentary on Count Rules, section 3-14

Field Detail

candidateID

protected transient int candidateID
Identifier for the candidate. The data should be loaded in such a way that the assignment of candidate IDs is fair and unbiased.

lastCountNumber

protected transient int lastCountNumber
The number of rounds of counting so far

MAX_CANDIDATES

public static final int MAX_CANDIDATES
Maximum expected number of candidates in any one constituency.

See Also:
List of political parties in Ireland The average number of candidates could be much less., Constant Field Values

Returns:

public byte getStatus()
Get status at the current round of counting; CandidateStatus.ELECTED, CandidateStatus.ELIMINATED or CandidateStatus.CONTINUING

Returns:

getTotalAtCount

public int getTotalAtCount(int count)
How many votes have been received by this round of counting?

Parameters:
count - The round of counting
Returns:
The total number of votes received so far

getUniqueID

public static int getUniqueID()

getVoteAtCount

protected int getVoteAtCount(int count)
Gets number of votes added or removed in this round of counting.

Parameters:
count - This count number
Returns:
A positive number if the candidate received transfers or a negative number if the candidate's surplus was distributed or the candidate was eliminated and votes transfered to another.

isAfter

public boolean isAfter(Candidate other)
Determines the relative ordering of the candidate in the event of a tie.

Parameters:
other - The other candidate to compare with this candidate
Returns:
true if other candidate is not selected

isElected

public boolean isElected()
Has this candidate been elected?

Returns:
true if elected
